readable.content: a little girl in a blue and pink leotard is walking along a beam whilst a person 's hand is stretched out to support her . A little girl in a blue and pink outfit is walking on a balance beam with the aid of woman standing to her left . A little girl walking down a balance beam with an adult ready to assist . A young girl is standing on a balance beam . A young girl practicing gymnastics on a balance beam .
